title: RUN Doesn't Make Any Sense... But It's Still Dumb Fun | Here's Why
author: Think Story
comment:
In High School we had to do the mile and I got in last place and it haunts me to this very day...

Like this vid? Check out my Think Story Takedown Videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLY9KJ1cFVs7gkVDc9F4fvcy3Q1q_f5DKn
The whole movie I thought “damn she’s a beast in that wheelchair” lol I had no idea the actress uses one in real life. Makes sense now.
Based on the trailers, the movie reminded me of the story of Gypsy Rose Blanchard, but slightly different.

There are a few things you're writing off as plot conveniences that aren't conveniences at all. Like the internet "conveniently being down," where you missed the mom sitting in the background, having watched the kid and killed the connection herself. And mom was writing the email about the delusions as a cover, which she did a couple of other times. Nevermind the "engineering heater thing" being a soldering iron, which they had also established her using earlier. Not trying to be smart, but were you fully watching this movie? (I didn't even think it was that good, but if you aren't paying attention, it's going to be a helluva lot worse.)
The only confusing part was when sarah paulson was showering and she had marks they didn't even explain
description:
RUN, the latest Hulu original starring Sarah Paulson and Kiera Allen is a fun thriller that doesn't make any sense.
